tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE live_broadcast_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    channel_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ProgramSchedule (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  program_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  program_duration INT NOT NULL,
  program_channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE live_broadcast_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    program_time TIMESTAMP,
    channel_id INT,
    presenter_name VARCHAR(255),
    program_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE broadcasting_schedule (
   schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   program_id INT,
   channel_id INT,
   scheduled_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES broadcast_programs(program_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES channels(channel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BroadcastPrograms (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  program_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ProgramSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  channel_id INT,
  air_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES BroadcastPrograms(program_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES BroadcastChannels(channel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ViewerWatchHistory (
  watch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  viewer_id INT,
  program_id INT,
  watch_date DATE,
  watched_duration INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES ProgramViewers(viewer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES BroadcastPrograms(program_id)
);
